name: GiantsFan
0:
”Alexa, open Giants fan.”
”Alexa, ask Giants fan for a flash briefing on the Giants.”
”Alexa, ask Giants fan about the previous game score.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: giants fan
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get unofficial to-the-minute stats & fun facts on the Giants by Fresh Digital Group. This skill isn’t sponsored or endorsed by the Giants.

Here’s some ways you can use the skill. We have given you many different ways for you to talk to Alexa:



General Updates:


Alexa, ask Giants Fan how are the Giants doing? 

Alexa, ask Giants Fan who do the Giants play next?

Alexa, ask Giants Fan Eli Manning (or any player's First name, Last name) touchdown update. 



Fun Facts about the Giants:


Alexa, ask Giants Fan to tell me some trivia about the Giants. 

Alexa, ask Giants Fan how many Super Bowls have the Giants won?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
